vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.8;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Parshandatha (H6577), Dalphon (H1813), Aspatha (H0630), Adalia (H0118), Aridatha (H0743), Parmashta (H6534), Arisai (H0747), Aridai (H0742) and Vaizatha (H2055)
§ Poratha = "fruitfulness" or "frustration"
one of the ten sons of Haman, the enemy of Mordecai and Esther
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
破拉他
1) 哈曼十個兒子的其中一個{#斯 9:8|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
破拉他
1) 哈曼十个儿子的其中一个{#斯 9:8|}
